topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552dd4ef63687211380f0b00#post_552dd4ef63687211380f0b00
I did have on thing that bugged me 

[bq] if I had one criticism of the movie it's that both yuki and ame [spoiler]seem to loose appreciation for the fact that they can be both wolf and human and just stick to one forever. As someone who would love to be able to do that, that bugs the crap out of me. It's like someone not eating the crust of their pizza. Like, exceptionally good pizza crust. It drives me nuts a little.  Maybe it's just a personal nitpick[/spoiler][/bq]

Also I am never watching this movie with another person in the room

"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552dd7ec6368724eeb202a00#post_552dd7ec6368724eeb202a00
It's not just glbt, but half of video gamers are women, a disproportionately high number of geeks are minorities on top of the high percentage of glbt that are geeks.  When you get down to it the stereotype of geeks being straight white guys is the exact opposite of the truth.

Simply put if someone goes, "geeks are a bunch of single straight white guys" or something along the lines they're a utter fucking idiot.

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552dd5bd6368722bd2130100#post_552dd5bd6368722bd2130100
Hey I see where your coming from.

[spoiler]For starters if I could change into a fucking WOLF BEASTMAN at will I'd totally use both sides of both worlds. 

But the way I see it is unlike us who would more than likely gain abilities like that later in life they were kids, and they grew up seeing there abilities differently.

Where Yuki at first liked being a Wolf and a Human she grew up to kind of hate her powers thanks to hurting the one she loved.

Where as Ame grew up loving his powers by appreciating Nature and hanging out and being teached by his Sensei.

But hey its still possibly different for others.[/spoiler]
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552dda6963687271667f0900#post_552dda6963687271667f0900
[bq="Thanotos Omega"]"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552dd9bb636872638db11700#post_552dd9bb636872638db11700
Maybe, just maybe, because some of them throw fucking fits if you have a black guy playing Heimdal, Pretending we don't have allot of very vocal assholes in our ranks is just silly,[/bq]
To be fair the cyber-terrorism didn't help you guys popularity wise. . or how your movement called anyone that was a minority, woman or glbt that disagreed with them "sockpuppets" or called them "too stupid to know their place" or said that women who disagreed with them "should go back to the kitchen" or such.

From my perspective a movement calling me a "faggot retard" and then saying that "I need to learn my place" isn't going to make me receptive to what they're saying.  If you ever wonder why the whole #notyourshield twitter trend started it was because we were tired of being called "faggot"/"wetback"/"raghead"/"n****r" or such by people claiming to be fighting for our rights.  I know you've never done this, but your movement going around calling me a "faggot" for disagreeing won't win me any level of respect for them at all.

Here's my honest opinions on third wavers in a nutshell from personal experience:
How third wavers believe they are acting, "I'm fighting for equality"

How they actually act, "I'm fighting for your equality you f****t n****r raghead retard!"
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552dda6963687271667f0900#post_552dda6963687271667f0900
They're just going to pretend they don't exist, and pass them off as "strawmen" or accuse them of "internal racism or internal sexism".


"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552ddaff6368724eeb5a2e00#post_552ddaff6368724eeb5a2e00
I know. That's what's wrong about them. Day and day, they're being proving wrong again. Most people, regardless of gender or skin colour, alike I've ever interacted with behave like any normal human beings, they aren't SJW or any of those crazy wackjobs. In fact, some of them hold doors for me just as I or anyone else hold doors for anyone else.
